name: @tempo/agent
description: Core engine for db interactions and desicion making

scripts.package: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install && pnpm run build && npm_config_target=18.0.0 npm_config_arch=x64 npm_config_target_platform=linux npm_config_build_from_source=true pnpm rebuild better-sqlite3 && mkdir -p native && cp node_modules/better-sqlite3/build/Release/better_sqlite3.node native/ && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output bin/tempo-agent && pnpm install
scripts.package-win: pnpm run build && set npm_config_target=18.0.0&& set npm_config_arch=x64&& pnpm rebuild better-sqlite3 && if not exist native mkdir native && copy node_modules\better-sqlite3\build\Release\better_sqlite3.node native\ && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output bin/tempo-agent.exe
